tool_description: Manages chargeback disputes including automated response generation, evidence collection, and resolution tracking.

original_transaction_id.description: ID of the original disputed transaction

dispute_reason.description: Reason code for the chargeback dispute

action_type.description: Action to take (accept, dispute, provide_evidence, request_arbitration)

error_messages: Chargeback not found: Chargeback ID does not exist in system
Invalid transaction reference: Original transaction ID not found
Unknown dispute reason: Dispute reason code not recognized
Invalid action type: Action must be accept, dispute, provide_evidence, or request_arbitration
Evidence required: Evidence documents required for dispute action
Deadline expired: Response deadline for chargeback has passed
usage: Provide chargeback_id, original_transaction_id, dispute_reason, and desired action_type. Include evidence_documents array when disputing the chargeback.

recommended_action.description: System-recommended action based on case analysis

dispute_amount.description: Amount being disputed in the chargeback
